name: Little Nightmares II: Enhanced Edition
storyline: The world of Little Nightmares 2 is corrupted by an evil signal form a distant transmission tower. You are Mono, a young boy trapped in this twisted nightmare. But you're not alone. Six, a girl in a yellow raincoat, is your guide. Together you'll have to sneak through this rotten world, while the twisted inhabitants try to catch you. If you can reach the tower, you might be able to stop the signal turning everybody into monsters.
summary:
- The Enhanced Edition brings 4K graphics, ray-tracing, and more updates that bring the horrors to life
- You'll need to navigate creepy woodlands, a sinister school, and other hauntingly beautiful surroundings
- There's plenty of puzzles to solve, villains to outsmart, and traps to avoid on your way to the tower
